content: "Almost everything can be Provenance" and "Almost everything can be Observation". The rest of FHIR is all about ergonomics ;-)

to think that Provenance thinks it is everything to every activity is to ignore how hard I work to enable embedded provenance where that is the right thing to do for that specific resource -- http://build.fhir.org/fivews.html
You're absolutely right @John Moehrke -- I think you're doing exactly the right (hard!) work in a very challening problem space.
